name: Nights of the Fabled Hunt
description:
Rodar, once home to the magical world of folk tales, living happily protected by their deity Fos, the Light Keeper, was destroyed by the Wretched, a part of the population of Rodar corrupted by Anguis the Vile Whisperer, the evil brother of Fos.

The two gods fought a war for Rodar where evil triumphed and brought the fabled world of folklore to ruins.

But not all hope is lost, a descendent of Little Red Riding Hood was saved and trained by the Huntsman, and now she’s back on Rodar to fight to save her origin world.

Features
  • Different runs. At every run, your equipment will be randomly chosen, as will be the different settings and bosses
  • Hunt down your antagonist. As you explore the world looking for your prey, never let your guard down, there is no way to know what is waiting in the dark, maybe something useful or maybe something evil.
  • Fight on every front. Use the weapon and Grimades (magical throwable items) at your disposal, and exploit the combination of the Grimods (status effects) they inflict to create powerful synergies.
